sys_update_version.payload: standardc.text-center button { background-color: #0078d7; /* Brand blue */ color: #fff; /* White text */ font-size: 20px; /* Larger text */ font-weight: 600; /* Semi-bold */ padding: 16px 40px; /* Big button size */ border: none; /* Remove border */ border-radius: 12px; /* Rounded corners */ cursor: pointer; /* Hand cursor */ transition: all 0.3s ease; /* Smooth hover animation */ box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); /* Soft shadow */ } /* Hover effect */ .text-center button:hover { background-color: #005a9e; /* Darker blue */ transform: translateY(-2px); /* Slight lift */ box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.25); } /* Active (click) effect */ .text-center button:active { transform: translateY(0); /* Pressed down */ box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); } sp_instancefalsefalseCopy of nareshtruefalsesp_widgetDEPAVATH.NARESH2025-09-07 05:51:1331b6fbca947322107f448691b50f3c360Copy of nareshe8373316286322107f449b0adbfc117ce8373316286322107f449b0adbfc117csp_widget_31b6fbca947322107f448691b50f3c36DEPAVATH.NARESH2025-09-07 05:51:13
